Name: P. Poojitha
AU25UG1043

(01)

a) Population mean = 72bpm
Sample mean = 69bpm.

b) $H_0$: The new relaxation app does not reduces the average resting rate of regular users.
$H_1$: The new relaxation app reduces the average resting rate of regular users.

c) $\frac{x - 4}{\sqrt{n}} \Rightarrow \frac{69 - 72}{\sqrt{64}} \Rightarrow \frac{-3}{8}$ = standard error.
⇒ The no. of errors from the baseline to the mean.

d) z-score = $\frac{\sigma}{se} \Rightarrow \frac{3}{-3/8}$
⇒ $\frac{24}{3} \Rightarrow -8$

e)

![img-0.jpeg](img-0.jpeg)

Q2)

a) $$ P(B|A) \cdot P(A) $$
= 20%

b) $$ P(A|B) $$
If the message is not spam, the filter still marks it as "spam" with probability 0.05.

c) $$ P(B) = P(B|A) \cdot P(A) + P(B|\sim A) \cdot P(\sim A) $$
= $$ 0.95 \times 0.2 + 0.05 \times 0.1 $$

d) Posterior probability is higher.
